definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Humans lived as roaming hunters and gatherers for most of their existence.
sentences.chinese: 当时的人类群体绝大部分是以游猎部落形式存在的。

sentences.english: In 20 years, he is engaged in majority time party work works.
sentences.chinese: 二十年中，绝大部分时间他在从事党务工作。

sentences.english: His idea ofalienation was derived mostly from Hegel.
sentences.chinese: 他的关于异化的理念绝大部分脱胎于黑格尔。

sentences.english: Those are put in the galosh on the balcony, the majority made a patch.
sentences.chinese: 那些放在阳台上的套鞋，绝大部分是打了补丁的。

sentences.english: At present, mostly cables bridge frames are made by thin steel plate in our country.
sentences.chinese: 目前，国内绝大部分电缆桥架均采用薄钢板制造。
他们花费绝大部分时间凑在一起喝酒。

sentences.english: Microorganisms do most of the work.
sentences.chinese: 微生物做绝大部分的工作。

sentences.english: This will cover the vast majority of roundtrip problems.
sentences.chinese: 这将包括绝大部分往返问题。

sentences.english: Now and then, someone gave him a ride , but most of the way he walked.
sentences.chinese: 偶尔有人会让他搭个便车，但绝大部分路他得自己走。

sentences.english: Most metals (copper, iron) are good conductors of electricity.
sentences.chinese: 它们中的绝大部分都像铜和锌一样，是电流的良导体。

sentences.english: Believe that the majority of people in the youth in life gets pimples.
sentences.chinese: 相信绝大部分人在青春年少时都会得青春痘。

sentences.english: As an envoy, Bush could assuage most of these worries.
sentences.chinese: 作为大使，布什能够缓和绝大部分的困扰。

sentences.english: Therefore, the majority of liver cancer patients need non-surgical treatment.
sentences.chinese: 为此，绝大部分肝癌患者需非手术治疗。

sentences.english: The bentonite in coal series is very rich.
sentences.chinese: 煤系地层中膨润土储量相当丰富，绝大部分品质优良。

sentences.english: Most of those from his village are illiterate.
sentences.chinese: 他们村绝大部分村民家的孩子都是文盲。

sentences.english: Almost all of Luxun's essays were directed at the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 鲁迅的杂文绝大部分是对准敌人的。

definition: in large part/the greater part/the majority
for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
for the most part/on the whole/also pr. [da4 du1]
for the most part/on the whole/metropolitan
